item.title: Interactive Learning Roadmap - Part 2
Interactive learning roadmap - Part 1
item.description: Introduction Data Exploratory Data Analysis First Roadmap Conclusions References Introduction Recently one of the problems I was trying to solve required matrix algebra. This falls under the umbrella of need to know R basics so I realised I needed a way to track and refresh my R skills, recognise gaps and ultimately create a reference cheat-sheet.
